203.description: I certify that I am the individual named above, that my date of birth and address are as stated above, and the signature

209.description: I currently hold a Yukon driver’s licence. Driver’s licence number:

213.description: The personal information contained in this form is collected under the authority of sections 38 and 38.12 of the Motor Vehicles Act and under the

216.description: authority of section 29(c) of the Access to Information and Protection of Privacy Act. The personal information is used to administer the driver’s licence
